org.corfudb.protocols.wireprotocol

Class MsgHandlingFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.protocols.wireprotocol.MsgHandlingFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<CorfuMsg,List<CorfuMsg>>

    public class MsgHandlingFilter
extends Object
implements Function<CorfuMsg,List<CorfuMsg>>
    This class is a representation of a transforming filter, it is composed of a filter and a list of transforming functions. filter: represents a Function which maps an instance of a CorfuMsg to a boolean, indicating whether the transformation functions should or should not be applied. transform functions: captured as a list of Functions representing actions each of which when applied on a CorfuMsg will transform it to different instance of CorfuMsg. Consequently, the input message will be transformed through consecutive application of transforming functions. An example of a transformation function is a function particular instances CorfuMsg can be transformed to null (e.g. dropped). Another example of a such transforming functions is a function the replicate specific instances of CorfuMessages and hence replicate receiving redundant messages.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MsgHandlingFilter

        public MsgHandlingFilter(@NonNull
                         Function<CorfuMsg,Boolean> filter,
                         @NonNull
                         Function<CorfuMsg,CorfuMsg> transformFunction)
        A convenience constructor for when MsgHandlingFilter is being constructed by a filter and a single transformation function on the message.
        Parameters:
        filter - a function indicating whether the MsgHandlingFilter should filter the message by applying the provided transformFunction on the messages.
        transformFunction - a function representing a transformation on the message which will transform a message given the filter evaluates to true for a message. Transforming message to null is an example representing a message being dropped. Existence of a transformFunction is core to existence of an instances for this class and cannot be Null.

      • MsgHandlingFilter

        public MsgHandlingFilter(@NonNull
                         Function<CorfuMsg,Boolean> filter,
                         @NonNull
                         List<Function<CorfuMsg,CorfuMsg>> transformFunctions)
        Constructing a MsgHandlingFilter. Provided filter indicates whether the functions representing transformations must be applied on a message.
        Parameters:
        filter - a function indicating whether the MsgHandlingFilter should filter the message by applying the provided transformFunctions on the messages.
        transformFunctions - a list of functions representing a transformations on the message which will transform a message given the filter evaluates to true for a message. Transforming messages to null is an example representing a message being dropped. Existence of transformFunctions is core to existence of instances for the class and cannot be Null.

        a handling filter that drops messages with types provided to this method

      • msgDropUniformRandomFilter

        public static MsgHandlingFilter msgDropUniformRandomFilter(Double droppingProbability)
        A convenience method for creating a handling filter which checks all inbound messages and drops them according to probability . This function uses a uniform random function for dropping messages.
        Returns:
        a handling filter that randomly drops messages according to provided probability.

      • msgDropUniformRandomFilterFor

        public static MsgHandlingFilter msgDropUniformRandomFilterFor(Set<CorfuMsgType> toBeDroppedTypeSet,
                                                              Double droppingProbability)
        A convenience method for creating a handling filter which checks all inbound messages and drops messages with types included in with a probability of . This function uses a uniform random function for dropping messages.
        Returns:
        a handling filter that randomly drops messages according to provided probability.

      • msgDropGaussianFilter

        public static MsgHandlingFilter msgDropGaussianFilter(Double filteringSigma)
        A convenience method for creating a handling filter which checks all inbound messages and using a gaussian (normal) distribution, drops the messages outside the standard deviation provided by . For example using 1.0, 2.0, or 3.0 for filtering sigma, correspondingly allows 68%, 95%, or 99.7% of inbound messages and drops the rest. This function uses a gaussian random generator for simulating the normal distribution.
        Parameters:
        filteringSigma - a positive double representing cut off for filtering the messages.
        Returns:
        a handling filter that randomly drops messages according to provided filtering sigma.

      • msgDropGaussianFilterFor

        public static MsgHandlingFilter msgDropGaussianFilterFor(Set<CorfuMsgType> toBeDroppedTypeSet,
                                                         Double filteringSigma)
        A convenience method for creating a handling filter. This filter drops the messages with types included a normal distribution. Using a gaussian (normal) distribution, it drops the messages outside the standard deviation provided by . For example using 1.0, 2.0, or 3.0 for filtering sigma, correspondingly allows 68%, 95%, or 99.7% of inbound messages and drops the rest. This function uses a gaussian random generator for simulating the normal distribution.
        Parameters:
        filteringSigma - a positive double representing cut off for filtering the messages.
        Returns:
        a handling filter that randomly drops messages according to provided filtering sigma.
